info.name: EPCIS Examples - 1.2
info.description: Collection containing sample requests to be made to an EPCIS repository _(FasTnT)_.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<epcis:EPCISDocument xmlns:epcis="urn:epcglobal:epcis:xsd:1" creationDate="2017-09-19T12:57:12Z" schemaVersion="1.0">
   <EPCISBody>
      <EventList>
         <ObjectEvent>
            <eventTime>2018-06-14T12:51:17Z</eventTime>
            <eventTimeZoneOffset>+01:00</eventTimeZoneOffset>
            <epcList>
            	<epc>urn:epc:id:sscc:4001356.5900000817</epc>
            </epcList>
            <action>ADD</action>
            <bizStep>urn:fastnt:demo:bizstep:demo:packing</bizStep>
            <disposition>urn:epcglobal:cbv:disp:loading</disposition>
            <readPoint>
               <id>urn:fastnt:demo:readpoint:0037000.00729.210,432</id>
            </readPoint>
            <bizLocation>
               <id>urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.0</id>
            </bizLocation>
            <customEvent xmlns="http://epcis.fastnt.com/custom" test="true">Test</customEvent>
         </ObjectEvent>
      </EventList>
   </EPCISBody>
</epcis:EPCISDocument>

<epcismd:EPCISMasterDataDocument xmlns:epcismd="urn:epcglobal:epcis-masterdata:xsd:1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" schemaVersion="1.0" creationDate="2005-07-11T11:30:47.0Z">
   <EPCISBody> 
     <VocabularyList> 
       <Vocabulary type="urn:epcglobal:epcis:vtype:BusinessLocation"> 
         <VocabularyElementList> 
           <VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.0"> 
             <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/mda/latitude">+18.0000</attribute> 
            <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/mda/longitude">-70.0000</attribute>
             <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/mda/address">
               <example:Address xmlns:example="http://epcis.example.com/ns">
                 <Street>100 Nowhere Street</Street>
                 <City>Fancy</City>
                 <State>DC</State>
                 <Zip>99999</Zip>
               </example:Address>
             </attribute>
             <children>
               <id>urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.8201</id>
               <id>urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.8202</id>
             </children>
           </VocabularyElement>
           <VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.8201">
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:sst">201</attribute>
           </VocabularyElement>
           <VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.8202">
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:sst">202</attribute>
             <children>
               <id>urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.8203</id>
             </children>
           </VocabularyElement>
           <VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.8203">
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:sst">202</attribute>
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:ssa">402</attribute>
           </VocabularyElement>
         </VocabularyElementList>
       </Vocabulary>
       <Vocabulary type="urn:epcglobal:epcis:vtype:ReadPoint">
         <VocabularyElementList>
           <VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.8201">
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:site">0037000007296</attribute>
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:sst">201</attribute>
           </VocabularyElement>
           <VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.8202">
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:site">0037000007296</attribute>
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:sst">202</attribute>
           </VocabularyElement>
           <VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:0037000.00729.8203">
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:site">0037000007296</attribute>
             <attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:sst">203</attribute>
           </VocabularyElement>
         </VocabularyElementList>
       </Vocabulary>
     </VocabularyList>
   </EPCISBody>
 </epcismd:EPCISMasterDataDocument>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<epcis:EPCISDocument xmlns:cbvmda="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda" xmlns:epcis="urn:epcglobal:epcis:xsd:1" xmlns:gs1ushc="http://epcis.gs1us.org/hc/ns"
xmlns:tl="http://epcis.tracelink.com/ns"
xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:sbdh="http://www.unece.org/cefact/namespaces/StandardBusinessDocumentHeader"
schemaVersion="1.2" creationDate="2018-06-12T06:31:32Z">
	<EPCISHeader>
		<sbdh:StandardBusinessDocumentHeader>
			<sbdh:HeaderVersion>1.0</sbdh:HeaderVersion>
			<sbdh:Sender>
				<sbdh:Identifier Authority="GLN">8779891013658</sbdh:Identifier>
			</sbdh:Sender>
			<sbdh:Receiver>
				<sbdh:Identifier Authority="GLN">8811891013778</sbdh:Identifier>
			</sbdh:Receiver>
			<sbdh:DocumentIdentification>
				<sbdh:Standard>EPCglobal</sbdh:Standard>
				<sbdh:TypeVersion>1.0</sbdh:TypeVersion>
				<sbdh:InstanceIdentifier>201806121745200001</sbdh:InstanceIdentifier>
				<sbdh:Type>Events</sbdh:Type>
				<sbdh:CreationDateAndTime>2018-06-12T06:31:32Z</sbdh:CreationDateAndTime>
			</sbdh:DocumentIdentification>
		</sbdh:StandardBusinessDocumentHeader>
		<extension>
			<EPCISMasterData>
				<VocabularyList>
					<Vocabulary type="urn:epcglobal:epcis:vtype:Location">
						<VocabularyElementList>
							<!-- SourceList owning_party (sold from business party) -->
							<VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:088202.867701.0">
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#name">Clara Manufacturing</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/additionalIdentifier">712333444</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/additionalIdentifierType">DEA</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/businessClassification">MANUFACTURER</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#streetAddressOne">10 Welsh St</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#city">Malden</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#state">MA</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#postalCode">02148</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#countryCode">US</attribute>
							</VocabularyElement>
							<!-- SourceList location (ship from location) -->
							<VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:9297187.01994.0">
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#name">Wilbur Pharmaceutical Imports</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/additionalIdentifier">412333444</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/additionalIdentifierType">DEA</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#streetAddressOne">154 Broadway</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#city">Somerville</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#state">MA</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#postalCode">02145</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#countryCode">US</attribute>
							</VocabularyElement>
							<!-- DestinationList owning_party (sold to business party) -->
							<VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:8887777.01384.0">
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#name">Watson Rx Wholesaler</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/additionalIdentifier">512333444</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/additionalIdentifierType">DEA</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/businessClassification">WHOLESALER</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#streetAddressOne">555 Neelan Road</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#city">Sacramento</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#state">CA</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#postalCode">95833</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#countryCode">US</attribute>
							</VocabularyElement>
							<!-- DestinationList location (ship to location) -->
							<VocabularyElement id="http://epcis.gs1us.org/hc/dea/loc/512333444">
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#name">Watson Rx Wholesaler</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/additionalIdentifier">512333444</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/additionalIdentifierType">DEA</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/businessClassification">WHOLESALER</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#streetAddressOne">555 Neelan Road</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#city">Sacramento</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#state">CA</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#postalCode">95833</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#countryCode">US</attribute>
							</VocabularyElement>
							<!-- SourceList location (Carrier Party) -->
							<VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgln:064202.867703.0">
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#name">FedEx</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#streetAddressOne">180 Fedex Road</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#streetAddressTwo">Building 6B</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#city">Atlanta</attribute>
								<attribute id="http://epcis.tracelink.com/mda/district">456</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#state">GA</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#postalCode">31305</attribute>
								<attribute id="urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda#countryCode">US</attribute>
							</VocabularyElement>
						</VocabularyElementList>
					</Vocabulary>
				</VocabularyList>
			</EPCISMasterData>
		</extension>
	</EPCISHeader>
	<EPCISBody>
		<EventList>
			<AggregationEvent>
				<eventTime>2018-06-12T06:31:32Z</eventTime>
				<eventTimeZoneOffset>-04:00</eventTimeZoneOffset>
				<parentID>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000019</parentID>
				<childEPCs>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207026272</epc>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207026273</epc>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207026274</epc>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207026275</epc>
				</childEPCs>
				<action>ADD</action>
				<bizStep>urn:epcglobal:cbv:bizstep:packing</bizStep>
				<disposition>urn:epcglobal:cbv:disp:in_progress</disposition>
				<bizLocation>
					<id>urn:epc:id:sgln:9297187.01994.0</id>
				</bizLocation>
				<tl:aggregationEventExtensions>
					<tl:epcOrderItemDetails>
						<tl:epcOrderItemList orderItemNumber="910">
							<tl:epcOrderItem>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000019</tl:epcOrderItem>
						</tl:epcOrderItemList>
					</tl:epcOrderItemDetails>
				</tl:aggregationEventExtensions>
			</AggregationEvent>
			<AggregationEvent>
				<eventTime>2018-06-12T06:31:32Z</eventTime>
				<eventTimeZoneOffset>-04:00</eventTimeZoneOffset>
				<parentID>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000020</parentID>
				<childEPCs>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207024592</epc>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207024593</epc>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207024594</epc>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207024595</epc>
				</childEPCs>
				<action>ADD</action>
				<bizStep>urn:epcglobal:cbv:bizstep:packing</bizStep>
				<disposition>urn:epcglobal:cbv:disp:in_progress</disposition>
				<bizLocation>
					<id>urn:epc:id:sgln:9297187.01994.0</id>
				</bizLocation>
				<tl:aggregationEventExtensions>
					<tl:epcOrderItemDetails>
						<tl:epcOrderItemList orderItemNumber="910">
							<tl:epcOrderItem>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000020</tl:epcOrderItem>
						</tl:epcOrderItemList>
					</tl:epcOrderItemDetails>
				</tl:aggregationEventExtensions>
			</AggregationEvent>
			<AggregationEvent>
				<eventTime>2018-06-12T06:31:32Z</eventTime>
				<eventTimeZoneOffset>-05:00</eventTimeZoneOffset>
				<parentID>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000021</parentID>
				<childEPCs>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207024596</epc>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:068202.0401034.11220207024597</epc>
				</childEPCs>
				<action>ADD</action>
				<bizStep>urn:epcglobal:cbv:bizstep:packing</bizStep>
				<disposition>urn:epcglobal:cbv:disp:in_progress</disposition>
				<bizLocation>
					<id>urn:epc:id:sgln:9297187.01994.0</id>
				</bizLocation>
				<tl:aggregationEventExtensions>
					<tl:epcOrderItemDetails>
						<tl:epcOrderItemList orderItemNumber="910">
							<tl:epcOrderItem>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000021</tl:epcOrderItem>
						</tl:epcOrderItemList>
					</tl:epcOrderItemDetails>
				</tl:aggregationEventExtensions>
			</AggregationEvent>
			<!-- Shipping -->
			<ObjectEvent>
				<eventTime>2018-06-12T06:31:32Z</eventTime>
				<eventTimeZoneOffset>-04:00</eventTimeZoneOffset>
				<epcList>
					<epc>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000021</epc>
				</epcList>
				<action>OBSERVE</action>
				<bizStep>urn:epcglobal:cbv:bizstep:shipping</bizStep>
				<disposition>urn:epcglobal:cbv:disp:in_transit</disposition>
				<readPoint>
					<id>urn:epc:id:sgln:9997777.01994.0</id>
				</readPoint>
				<bizTransactionList>
					<bizTransaction type="urn:epcglobal:cbv:btt:desadv">urn:epcglobal:cbv:bt:8779891013658:H9022413</bizTransaction>
					<bizTransaction type="urn:epcglobal:cbv:btt:po">urn:epcglobal:cbv:bt:8811891013778:PO654321</bizTransaction>
				</bizTransactionList>
				<extension>
					<sourceList>
						<!-- owning_party = from business party -->
						<source type="urn:epcglobal:cbv:sdt:owning_party">urn:epc:id:sgln:088202.867701.0</source>
						<!-- location = Ship from location -->
						<source type="urn:epcglobal:cbv:sdt:location">urn:epc:id:sgln:9297187.01994.0</source>
						<!-- carrier_party = Transportation carrier -->
						<source type="http://epcis.tracelink.com/sdt/carrier_party">urn:epc:id:sgln:064202.867703.0</source>
					</sourceList>
					<destinationList>
						<!-- owning_paty = to business party -->
						<destination type="urn:epcglobal:cbv:sdt:owning_party">urn:epc:id:sgln:8887777.01384.0</destination>
						<!-- location = Ship to location -->
						<destination type="urn:epcglobal:cbv:sdt:location">http://epcis.gs1us.org/hc/dea/loc/512333444</destination>
					</destinationList>
				</extension>
				<tl:shippingEventExtensions>
					<tl:transactionDate>2018-06-12</tl:transactionDate>
					<tl:shipToCountryCode>US</tl:shipToCountryCode>
					<tl:salesDistributionType>INCOUNTRYSALE</tl:salesDistributionType>
					<tl:supplyType>MedicalCareDistribution</tl:supplyType>
					<tl:contractType>CompetitiveBid</tl:contractType>
					<tl:dropShipmentIndicator>false</tl:dropShipmentIndicator>
					<tl:comments>Special shipment handling</tl:comments>
					<tl:contractNubmer>C102</tl:contractNubmer>
					<tl:fundingSource>OwnFunds</tl:fundingSource>
					<tl:epcOrderItemDetails>
						<tl:epcOrderItemList orderItemNumber="910">
							<tl:epcOrderItem>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000019</tl:epcOrderItem>
							<tl:epcOrderItem>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000020</tl:epcOrderItem>
							<tl:epcOrderItem>urn:epc:id:sscc:005434.40000000021</tl:epcOrderItem>
						</tl:epcOrderItemList>
					</tl:epcOrderItemDetails>
					<tl:orderItemList>
						<tl:orderItem>
							<tl:orderItemNumber>910</tl:orderItemNumber>
							<tl:packagingItemCode type="GTIN-14">00992326050107</tl:packagingItemCode>
							<cbvmda:itemExpirationDate>2020-06-12</cbvmda:itemExpirationDate>
							<tl:quantity>5</tl:quantity>
							<tl:unitPrice currencyCode="USD">50.43</tl:unitPrice>
							<tl:vat currencyCode="USD">50.00</tl:vat>
							<tl:grossPrice currencyCode="USD">100.43</tl:grossPrice>
							<tl:transactionIdentifier type="PO" date="2018-06-12">PO97</tl:transactionIdentifier>
						</tl:orderItem>
					</tl:orderItemList>
				</tl:shippingEventExtensions>
			</ObjectEvent>
		</EventList>
	</EPCISBody>
</epcis:EPCISDocument>

  <EPCISBody>

    <id>urn:fastnt:demo:bizloc:0037000.00729.210</id>
  </bizLocation>
</AggregationEvent></eventList></QueryResults></s:Body></s:Envelope>

item.name: Parameters
item.description: One example of every kind of SimpleEventQuery parameters

response.name: Perform a Poll query

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Content-Encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: X-AspNet-Version
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

header.name: X-SourceFiles
header.description: Custom header
